hero.title: About Thamizhi
hero.description: Discover our mission to preserve Tamil heritage, promote cultural understanding, and build a stronger Tamil community through education, arts, and community engagement.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To preserve, promote, and celebrate Tamil culture and language through education, community programs, and cultural events that connect generations and strengthen our global Tamil community.
mission.content_tamil: கல்வி, சமுதாய திட்டங்கள் மற்றும் பண்பாட்டு நிகழ்வுகள் மூலம் தமிழ் பண்பாடு மற்றும் மொழியைப் பாதுகாத்து, ஊக்குவித்து, கொண்டாடுவது எங்கள் நோக்கம்.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: A thriving global Tamil community where cultural heritage is preserved, language is celebrated, and future generations carry forward the rich traditions of Tamil civilization.
vision.content_tamil: பண்பாட்டு பாரம்பரியம் பாதுகாக்கப்பட்டு, மொழி கொண்டாடப்பட்டு, எதிர்கால சந்ததியினர் தமிழ் நாகரிகத்தின் வளமான பாரம்பரியங்களை முன்னெடுத்துச் செல்லும் வளர்ச்சியடைந்த உலகளாவிய தமிழ் சமுதாயம்.

values.title: Cultural Preservation
values.description: Safeguarding Tamil traditions, arts, and customs for future generations

values.title: Educational Excellence
values.description: Providing high-quality Tamil language education and cultural learning opportunities

values.title: Community Unity
values.description: Building strong bonds within the Tamil community through shared experiences and mutual support

values.title: Cultural Innovation
values.description: Adapting traditional practices to modern contexts while maintaining their essence

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2009, Thamizhi began as a small group of Tamil families who wanted to create a space where their children could learn about their cultural heritage. Over the years, we have grown into a vibrant community organization serving hundreds of families across the region.

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: Thamizhi was established by 15 founding families

milestones.title: First Cultural Center
milestones.description: Opened our first dedicated space for cultural activities

milestones.title: Language School Launch
milestones.description: Started formal Tamil language education programs

milestones.title: Digital Transformation
milestones.description: Expanded online programs and virtual cultural events

milestones.title: 15th Anniversary
milestones.description: Celebrating 15 years of community service and cultural preservation

board_members.name: Dr. Priya Kumaran
board_members.bio: Community leader with 20+ years of experience in cultural organizations

board_members.bio: Educator and advocate for Tamil language preservation

board_members.name: Ms. Meera Krishnan
board_members.bio: Professional organizer specializing in community events

board_members.name: Mr. Suresh Ramanan
board_members.bio: Financial expert ensuring transparent resource management

list.name: Tamil Language Education
list.description: Comprehensive Tamil language learning programs for all ages

list.name: Cultural Arts Training
list.description: Traditional dance, music, and performing arts instruction

list.name: Youth Development
list.description: Leadership and skill development programs for young people

list.name: Community Support Services
list.description: Assistance programs for families in need

list.name: Cultural Events

list.name: Senior Citizens Programs

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We welcome visitors and new members. Contact us to learn more about our programs and how you can get involved.
